channel.title: Command

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @rova0 rova0
item.description:
@rova0 wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:449696”][code]
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“range”)) {
if (c.inWild())
return;

     for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
        if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
           c.sendMessage("Take your items off before using this command.");
           return;
        }
     }
     int[] equip = { 12681, 10499, 6585, 9185, 4736, 1187, -1, 4738, -1, 7462, 11732, -1, 6733, -1 };
     if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,10000000)) {
     for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) {
        c.playerEquipment = equip;
        c.playerEquipmentN = 1;
        c.getItems().setEquipment(equip, 1, i);
     }
        c.getItems().addItem(15272, 7);
        c.getItems().addItem(3024, 3);
        c.getItems().addItem(6685, 2);
        c.getItems().addItem(11235, 1);
        c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1);
        c.getItems().addItem(3040, 1);
        c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1);
        c.getItems().addItem(9244,1000);
        c.getItems().addItem(11212,1000);
        c.playerMagicBook = 2;
        c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
        c.getItems().resetBonus();
        c.getItems().getBonus();
        c.getItems().writeBonus();
        c.updateRequired = true;
        c.update();
  } else {
  c.sendMessage("You don't have ennough money!@#!#!#@!#!@#!$@#@$!@?>#!@#");

}
}

[/code]
Sorry, had a spazm half way through…[/quote]

Nice, but do not forget to add:

…otherwise it will just make them carry 10m to use the command, but it won’t take the coins.

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("range")) {
         if (c.inWild())
            return;

         for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
            if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
               c.sendMessage("Take your items off before using this command.");
               return;
            }
         }
         int[] equip = { 12681, 10499, 6585, 9185, 4736, 1187, -1, 4738, -1, 7462, 11732, -1, 6733, -1 };
         if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,10000000)) {
         for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) {
            c.playerEquipment = equip;
            c.playerEquipmentN = 1;
            c.getItems().setEquipment(equip, 1, i);
         }
            c.getItems().addItem(15272, 7);
            c.getItems().addItem(3024, 3);
            c.getItems().addItem(6685, 2);
            c.getItems().addItem(11235, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(3040, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(9244,1000);
            c.getItems().addItem(11212,1000);
            c.playerMagicBook = 2;
            c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
            c.getItems().resetBonus();
            c.getItems().getBonus();
            c.getItems().writeBonus();
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.update();
      } else {
      c.sendMessage("You don't have ennough money!@#!#!#@!#!@#!$@#@$!@?>#!@#");
}
}

Sorry, had a spazm half way through…

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @igotguts3 igotguts3
item.description:
@igotguts3 wrote:

how do i make this command cost 10m???

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“range”)) {
if (c.inWild())
return;

		for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
			if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
				c.sendMessage("Take your items off before using this command.");
				return;
			}
		}
		int[] equip = { 12681, 10499, 6585, 9185, 4736, 1187, -1, 4738, -1, 7462, 11732, -1, 6733, -1 };
		for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) {
			c.playerEquipment[i] = equip[i];
			c.playerEquipmentN[i] = 1;
			c.getItems().setEquipment(equip[i], 1, i);
		}
			c.getItems().addItem(15272, 7);
			c.getItems().addItem(3024, 3);
			c.getItems().addItem(6685, 2);
			c.getItems().addItem(11235, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(3040, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9244,1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(11212,1000);
			c.playerMagicBook = 2;
			c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
			c.getItems().resetBonus();
			c.getItems().getBonus();
			c.getItems().writeBonus();
			c.updateRequired = true;
			c.update();
	}
